Title: Authorizes the assessors of the county of Nassau and the village of Freeport to accept applications for exemption from real property taxes from the Truth Haitian Pentecostal Church, Inc.
Summary: Authorizes the assessors of the county of Nassau and the village of Freeport to accept applications for exemption from real property taxes from the Truth Haitian Pentecostal Church, Inc.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the assessors of the county of Nassau and the village of Freeport to accept applications for exemption from real property taxes from the Truth Haitian Pentecostal Church, Inc. for a certain parcel in the town of Hempstead, Village of Freeport
